md:
giải nghĩa từ "neglected" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Neglected** (verb) /nɪˈɡlektɪd/

* Meaning: (to be) not given the care or attention that is needed or deserved.

* Vietnamese: bị bỏ quên, bị忽视.

* Example: The old house had been neglected for years and was in a state of disrepair.

* Related words:
	+ Neglect (verb): to fail to give something the care or attention that it needs.
	+ Negligent (adjective): failing to give proper care or attention to something.
	+ Neglectful (adjective): not giving enough care or attention to something.

Note: The word "neglected" can also be used as an adjective to describe something that has been neglected, such as "a neglected garden" or "a neglected child".

Neglected (verb) /nɪˈɡlektɪd/

  • Meaning: (to be) not given the care or attention that is needed or deserved.

  • Vietnamese: bị bỏ quên, bị忽视.

  • Example: The old house had been neglected for years and was in a state of disrepair.

  • Related words:

    • Neglect (verb): to fail to give something the care or attention that it needs.
    • Negligent (adjective): failing to give proper care or attention to something.
    • Neglectful (adjective): not giving enough care or attention to something.

Note: The word "neglected" can also be used as an adjective to describe something that has been neglected, such as "a neglected garden" or "a neglected child".
